name: techticker
0:
”Alexa open teck ticker”
”Alexa ask teck ticker to get categories”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teck ticker
des: Have the Alexa tech ticker Skill keep you informed every day with flash briefings, deals of the day, quote of the day, relevant articles, and more. This skill presents the curated top stories in tech from all the top tech news sites Automatically updated from the Launch Ticker email newsletter This skill works on all Alexa devices and Alexa enabled smartphones, tablets, and PCs.
